name: Slip N' Fish
description:
Your family needs you to gather fish! Keep gathering fish to keep the timer going. Collect as much fish as you can before the timer runs out for a fresh high score :)

Controls: Similar to a space game, motions are forward and rotate 

'W' - Run forward - Mild Thrust

'S' - Belly slide forward - Strong Thrust

'A' / 'D' - Rotate Left or Right
